title: The Zone Fighting Championship 2 - Showdown - Official Video
description:
The Zone FC 2 - Showdown - Official Video
-----------------------------------------------
The 10th of May 2008
Lisebergshallen, Gothenburg
Sweden

-

We are proud to present The Zone FC &#039;Showdown&#039; the first professional MMA event ever to hit the westcoast of sweden.

The Zone FC is essentially a sequel to the popular and well-recognized ?European Vale Tudo? (EVT) events, which took place between 2003 and 2006. EVT helped the careers of fighters such as Travis Lutter, Martin Kampmann and Dennis Siver, and the fight-card for Zone FC continues this tradition by being filled with up and comers, hoping to make a name for themselves.

The 9 fights on the card include fighters from Russia, Switzerland, Norway, Italy, and, of course, Sweden.

Get ready for a spectacular show!

-

Fightcard:

Nicklas Bergman (Sweden) vs. Oskar Sollevi (Sweden)
Martin Svensson (Sweden) vs. Frank Eriksson Barman (Sweden)
Peter Mettler (Switzerland) vs. Per Friden (Sweden)
